001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import com.github.benmanes.caffeine.cache.Caffeine;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
012
013import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
014import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
015
016import java.io.IOException;
017import java.net.MalformedURLException;
018import java.net.URI;
019import java.net.URISyntaxException;
020import java.net.URL;
021import java.nio.file.Path;
022import java.util.Collection;
023import java.util.Deque;
024import java.util.LinkedList;
025import java.util.Map;
026import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
027import java.util.stream.Collectors;
028
029import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
030
031public abstract class AbstractLoader<T> implements ILoader<T> {
032  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(AbstractLoader.class);
033
034  @NonNull
035  private final Map<URI, T> cache = ObjectUtils.notNull(Caffeine.newBuilder()
036      .maximumSize(100)
037      .expireAfterAccess(10, TimeUnit.MINUTES)
038      .<URI, T>build().asMap());
039
040  @Override
041  @NonNull
042  public Collection<T> getLoadedResources() {
043    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableCollection(ObjectUtils.notNull(cache.values()));
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Retrieve a mapping of resource URIs to the associated loaded resource.
048   *
049   * @return the mapping
050   */
051  @NonNull
052  protected Map<URI, T> getCachedEntries() {
053    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(cache);
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  @NonNull
058  public T load(@NonNull URI resource) throws MetaschemaException, IOException {
059    if (!resource.isAbsolute()) {
060      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("The URI '%s' must be absolute.", resource.toString()));
061    }
062    return loadInternal(resource, new LinkedList<>());
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Load a resource from the specified path.
067   *
068   * @param path
069   *          the resource to load
070   * @return the loaded instance for the specified resource
071   * @throws MetaschemaException
072   *           if an error occurred while processing the resource
073   * @throws IOException
074   *           if an error occurred parsing the resource
075   */
076  @Override
077  @NonNull
078  public T load(@NonNull Path path) throws MetaschemaException, IOException {
079    // use toURL to normalize the URI
080    return load(ObjectUtils.notNull(path.toAbsolutePath().normalize().toUri().toURL()));
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Loads a resource from the specified URL.
085   *
086   * @param url
087   *          the URL to load the resource from
088   * @return the loaded instance for the specified resource
089   * @throws MetaschemaException
090   *           if an error occurred while processing the resource
091   * @throws IOException
092   *           if an error occurred parsing the resource
093   */
094  @Override
095  @NonNull
096  public T load(@NonNull URL url) throws MetaschemaException, IOException {
097    try {
098      URI resource = url.toURI();
099      return loadInternal(ObjectUtils.notNull(resource), new LinkedList<>());
100    } catch (URISyntaxException ex) {
101      // this should not happen
102      LOGGER.error("Invalid url", ex);
103      throw new IOException(ex);
104    }
105  }
106
107  /**
108   * Loads a resource from the provided URI.
109   * <p>
110   * If the resource imports other resources, the provided
111   * {@code visitedResources} can be used to track circular imports. This is
112   * useful when this method recurses into included resources.
113   * <p>
114   * Previously loaded resources are provided by the cache. This method will add
115   * the resource to the cache after all imported resources have been loaded.
116   *
117   * @param resource
118   *          the resource to load
119   * @param visitedResources
120   *          a LIFO queue representing previously visited resources in an import
121   *          chain
122   * @return the loaded resource
123   * @throws MetaschemaException
124   *           if an error occurred while processing the resource
125   * @throws MalformedURLException
126   *           if the provided URI is malformed
127   * @throws IOException
128   *           if an error occurred parsing the resource
129   */
130  @NonNull
131  protected T loadInternal(@NonNull URI resource, @NonNull Deque<URI> visitedResources)
132      throws MetaschemaException, MalformedURLException, IOException {
133    // first check if the current resource has been visited to prevent cycles
134    if (visitedResources.contains(resource)) {
135      throw new MetaschemaException("Cycle detected in metaschema includes for '" + resource + "'. Call stack: '"
136          + visitedResources.stream().map(URI::toString).collect(Collectors.joining(",")));
137    }
138
139    T retval = cache.get(resource);
140    if (retval == null) {
141      LOGGER.info("Loading '{}'", resource);
142
143      try {
144        visitedResources.push(resource);
145        retval = parseResource(resource, visitedResources);
146      } finally {
147        visitedResources.pop();
148      }
149      cache.put(resource, retval);
150    } else if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
151      LOGGER.debug("Found resource in cache '{}'", resource);
152    }
153    return ObjectUtils.notNull(retval);
154  }
155
156  /**
157   * Parse the provided {@code resource}.
158   *
159   * @param resource
160   *          the resource to parse
161   * @param visitedResources
162   *          a stack representing previously parsed resources imported by the
163   *          provided {@code resource}
164   * @return the parsed resource
165   * @throws IOException
166   *           if an error occurred while parsing the resource
167   */
168  protected abstract T parseResource(@NonNull URI resource, @NonNull Deque<URI> visitedResources)
169      throws IOException;
170
171}
